term.title: sequential spectrometer

item.text: A spectrometer which enables the intensity of several spectral bands of radiation to be measured one after the other in time, i.e. sequentially.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1725. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-IX. Instrumentation for the spectral dispersion and isolation of optical radiation (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1729 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567101725)
